text:
From their whirlwind romance to welcoming their first child, here's a complete timeline of Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra's relationship.

“You have to look for someone who respects you. Respect is different from love and affection," she said, adding, "You’ve got to kiss a lot of frogs until you find your prince.”

While talking to Harper’s Bazaar UK for the magazine's March 2025 issue, Chopra said she wouldn't have married Jonas if he wasn't someone who would " tick all the right boxes " for her.

A month prior, Jonas called Chopra the " most amazing mom ever " in a Mother's Day post. "You are so full of love and thoughtfulness with our daughter @priyankachopra you are such an inspiration in every way," he added.

"Watching you with my daughter fills my heart with gratitude," the Love Again actress wrote on Instagram on Father's Day 2024. "You're an amazing dad and husband ."

The couple eventually wed in December 2018 after a very brief engagement and welcomed their daughter, Malti , via surrogate in January 2022.

The "Lovebug" bit Nick Jonas when he first met Priyanka Chopra in 2017.

01 of 29 2016: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra start texting AP/Shutterstock Chopra told Vogue that Jonas reached out to her on Twitter, suggesting they go out on a date. "I'm hearing from a few mutual friends that we should meet," he recalled writing in 2016. Chopra gave Jonas her number, and the two soon began a texting relationship, which Jonas described to Vogue as "friendly with an eye toward flirtation." The pair then met in person for the first time in 2017 at the Vanity Fair Oscars party — where Jonas got down on one knee. "This is in front of a bunch of people," he recalled. "I say, 'You're real. Where have you been all my life?' Like, loud."

02 of 29 May 2, 2017: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra attend the Met Gala together George Pimentel/WireImage A week before attending the 2017 Met Gala together as Ralph Lauren's guests, Chopra and Jonas first linked up when they grabbed a drink at The Carlyle in N.Y.C. Chopra invited Jonas back to her apartment (where her mother was home watching Law & Order) but was disappointed when the singer didn't kiss her. "It was too respectful if you ask me," Chopra told Vogue of the date. Despite hitting it off and attending the Met Gala together, the pair didn't become romantically involved until the following year. "We were both wearing Ralph Lauren! And we decided to go together because it was fun," Chopra said on Jimmy Kimmel Live.

03 of 29 2018: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra start out "casual" The Image Direct The pair stayed in touch after their Met Gala date, but things started to heat up the following year. "They're flirtatious and have been hanging out and text all the time," a source told PEOPLE of the pair in May 2018, adding that the relationship was "very casual." "Hanging out" included attending Beauty and the Beast Live in Concert in Los Angeles before spending the rest of Memorial Day weekend at a Dodgers game and then on Jonas' friend's boat.

04 of 29 June 2018: Priyanka Chopra meets Nick Jonas' family in New Jersey Gotham/GC Images In early June, Chopra accompanied Jonas to his cousin Rachel Tamburelli's New Jersey wedding. The couple was seen walking arm-in-arm together at the celebration in photos obtained by the Daily Mail. They were also spotted grabbing dinner together later. "It's a huge deal that Nick brought Priyanka to his cousin's wedding," a source close to the couple told PEOPLE. "He's dated a lot over the last couple years, but it's never been anything serious, so this is a big step." "Nick and Priyanka really like each other, and his family enjoyed getting to know her as well," the source added. "She fit right in!" The day after the nuptials, they were spotted laughing and mingling with friends and family over brunch.

05 of 29 June 22, 2018: Nick Jonas meets Priyanka Chopra's family in India Viral Bhayani/Splash News Weeks after Chopra accompanied Jonas to his cousin's wedding, the new couple flew to India for a week-long vacation so the singer could meet the actress's family, PEOPLE confirmed exclusively in late June. "They're very happy," said a source close to the couple. "It's getting serious." The couple also attended Aksha Ambani and Shloka Mehta's pre-wedding bash.

06 of 29 July 2018: Priyanka Chopra supports Nick Jonas on tour Splash News Following their week-long stay in India, Chopra and Jonas headed to Brazil, where Jonas performed at the VillaMix Festival alongside acts like Shawn Mendes and Jorge & Mateu. The actress shared a video from the concert on her Instagram Story, showing her affection for Jonas, writing "Him" alongside the clip - and adding a heart-eyes emoji.

07 of 29 July 18, 2018: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra get engaged Prodip Guha/Hindustan Times/Getty Images On July 27, PEOPLE confirmed the couple got engaged while in Crete, celebrating the actress's 36th birthday. Jonas closed down a London Tiffany & Co. store to buy an engagement ring, according to the insider. "They are so happy," the source shared.

08 of 29 August 19, 2018: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra go Instagram official with their engagement Nick Jonas/Instagram Three weeks after PEOPLE broke the engagement news, the couple confirmed their relationship status on Aug. 19 by each posting the same romantic engagement photo to Instagram. "Future Mrs. Jonas. My heart. My love," Jonas captioned the shot — which showed the couple embracing as she placed her hand (and massive engagement ring) on his chest.

09 of 29 August 2018: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra celebrate their engagement with loved ones Mushtaq Shiekh/Twitter The couple celebrated their upcoming nuptials with a party in Mumbai, India. Their respective families — who were meeting each other for the first time, plus many friends from her Bollywood circle — were in attendance.

10 of 29 November 2018: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra obtain their marriage license Gary Gershoff/WireImage The couple reportedly obtained a marriage license in early November, according to The Blast. Jonas and Chopra stopped by the Beverly Hills courthouse to fill out the necessary paperwork. The Blast also reported that they plan to file the license in both Chopra's native India and the United States to make their marriage official in both countries.

11 of 29 November 22, 2018: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra spend Thanksgiving together Priyanka Chopra/Instagram The couple celebrated the holiday in Delhi, India, with their families present. Jonas sat at the head of the (very long) table, with Chopra sitting at his right. "Happy Thanksgiving.. family.. forever..," Chopra wrote in the caption.

12 of 29 November 28, 2018: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra attend a puja ceremony Varinder Chawla/MEGA In anticipation of their nuptials, Jonas and Chopra participated in a November puja ceremony — a prayer ritual often performed to spiritually celebrate an event — at Chopra's house in Mumbai.

13 of 29 December 1, 2018: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra get married Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra. Priyanka Chopra/Instagram The couple's wedding extravaganza kicked off in India on Dec. 1 with a Western wedding officiated by the singer's dad, following a Hindu ceremony honoring Chopra's roots the next day. The newlyweds shared dozens of photos throughout the weekend, from the Mehendi ceremony to the sangeet, which included an epic sing-off from some of the pair's celebrity friends and family members.

14 of 29 December 5, 2018: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra walk their first red carpet as husband and wife PALLAV PALIWAL/AFP/Getty Shortly following their wedding, the newlyweds stepped out on the red carpet together for Bumble's launch party in New Delhi on Dec. 5. The event marked their red carpet debut as a married couple.

15 of 29 December 25, 2018: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra celebrate their first Christmas as a married couple For their first Christmas together as a married couple, Jonas and Chopra brought together both of their families in England. Those who celebrated the holiday together included Chopra's mother, Madhu Chopra, and brother, Siddharth Chopra, Jonas' parents, Paul Kevin Sr. and Denise Jonas, Jonas' younger brother, Frankie Jonas, as well as Jonas' older brother, Joe Jonas, and his then-fiancée, Sophie Turner.

16 of 29 February 2019: Priyanka Chopra appears in the Jonas Brothers' "Sucker" music video with Nick Jonas Priyanka Chopra/Instagram When the Jonas Brothers reunited in February 2019, Chopra was front and center for the "Sucker" music video. The video featured the wives of Kevin, Joe and Nick.

17 of 29 February 2019: Nick Jonas supports Priyanka Chopra at her film premiere Steve Granitz/WireImage In February 2019, the couple attended the Los Angeles premiere of Chopra's film Isn't It Romantic. The two shared loving looks as they walked the pink carpet together.

18 of 29 May 6, 2019: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas return to the Met Gala Nick and Priyanka Chopra Jonas. Neilson Barnard/Getty In May 2019, Chopra and Jonas' relationship came full circle as they returned to the Met Gala together in matching sparkly outfits.

19 of 29 January 17, 2020: Priyanka Chopra appears in the Jonas Brothers' "What a Man Gotta Do" music video Nick Jonas, Priyanka Chopra. Jonas Brothers When the Jonas Brothers released their single "What a Man Gotta Do" in January 2020, they enlisted their wives for the music video. For the video, which paid tribute to several hit movies, Chopra and Jonas recreated a scene from Risky Business.

20 of 29 March 2021: Nick Jonas writes a handful of songs about Priyanka Chopra for his 'Spaceman' album Nick Jonas' "Spaceman" music video. nick jonas/ youtube In March 2021, Jonas released a solo album titled Spaceman, which he explained was mostly just "love letters" to Chopra. "I sort of started writing this record back in July. My wife was over in Germany finishing up this little movie called The Matrix," Jonas said on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon. "And I was like, 'You know, I feel very disconnected from the world, first of all, and now my person.' And I just dug in writing ... within a couple of days I was like, 'Oh, this is a solo album.' And a few days later, I was like, 'This is a kind of themed album.'" Chopra even made a small cameo in the music video for the album's title song.

21 of 29 January 15, 2022: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas become parents Karwai Tang/WireImage On Jan. 15, Jonas and Chopra became parents as they welcomed a baby girl via surrogate. "We are overjoyed to confirm that we have welcomed a baby via surrogate. We respectfully ask for privacy during this special time as we focus on our family," the couple wrote on Instagram. They chose the name Malti Marie for their daughter.

22 of 29 January 25, 2023: Priyanka Chopra reveals that she and Nick Jonas have matching tattoos During an interview with British Vogue, Chopra shared the story behind her and her husband's matching tattoos. "I have a check and a box behind my ears," she said. "My husband has them on his arms because when he proposed, he asked me, that I checked all his boxes, and would I check another one?"

23 of 29 January 30, 2023: Priyanka Chopra supports Nick Jonas at Hollywood Walk of Fame ceremony The Jonas Brothers received their star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame — and Chopra was there to witness the exciting moment. During his acceptance speech, Jonas gave his wife and daughter, Malti, a shout-out. "To my beautiful wife, you are the calm in the crazy, the rock in the storm, and I love being married to you. It is the greatest gift," he said. "I love being a parent with you. Malti Marie, I can't wait to come here with you in 15 years and embarrass you in front of your friends."

24 of 29 March 9, 2023: Priyanka Chopra calls Nick Jonas her "greatest champion" While chatting with PEOPLE at the South Asian Excellence at the Oscars event in Los Angeles, Chopra gushed about Jonas. "My husband is my greatest champion. He's just such a supporter of me," she said. "[He] finished his shoot, came directly all jazzed up and ready to be here by my side. And, you know, he champions me and reminds me when I forget."

25 of 29 April 18, 2023: Nick Jonas supports Priyanka Chopra at premiere of 'Citadel' Mike Marsland/WireImage Jonas and Chopra attended the London premiere of her Amazon Prime TV series Citadel. The actress dazzled in an off-the-shoulder red gown, while Jonas looked handsome in an all-black ensemble. On Instagram, the pop star posted a video of himself gushing over Chopra at the event. The clip was set to the hit Jonas Brothers song "Burnin' Up," in which Jonas sings about a "red dress."

26 of 29 May 1, 2023: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas attend the Met Gala Nick and Priyanka Chopra Jonas. John Shearer/WireImage Chopra and Jonas walked the red carpet at the 2023 Met Gala in coordinating Valentino ensembles. The Citadel star wowed in a black strapless gown with a thigh-high slit, while Jonas channeled Karl Lagerfeld in a leather blazer and a skinny black tie. "I think the black and white is a classic Karl look," the "Jealous" singer told Vogue.

27 of 29 June 8, 2023: Nick Jonas says Father's Day is a day to celebrate Priyanka Chopra While talking to PEOPLE at the Tribeca Film Festival, Jonas shared his plans to celebrate Chopra on Father's Day — rather than make it a day all about him. “My dad did an incredible job of making sure that everyone else felt loved on Father's Day, and I'm going to try to adopt that from him," he said. "We as fathers would not be where we are as fathers without incredible women to make that dream come true." Jonas continued: "I'm so grateful to share this journey with my wife, who's just an absolute boss and amazing mother. It's more about her that day than me."

28 of 29 July 18, 2024: Nick Jonas celebrates Priyanka Chopra's 42nd birthday PUNIT PARANJPEPUNIT PARANJPE/AFP via Getty Jonas paid tribute to his wife on Instagram in honor of her 42nd birthday. "The woman that you are. How lucky am I. Happy birthday my love," he captioned the post featuring several images of Chopra.
authors: Lydia Price Is A Former Platforms Editor At People. She Left People In
Christina Butan Is A Senior Editor At Instyle Where She Edits
Writes Newsy Shopping Stories That Cover Everything Celebrity Style To Beauty Trends To Editor'S Picks.
title: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra's Relationship Timeline

meta_data.description: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra were married in December 2018 and welcomed their first child in January 2022. Here is a complete timeline of their relationship.
